entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate.
